action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: Berlin
TO: Lisbon
BY: Rented Car
CLASS: First
WHEN: In ten days

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
ME:  Have you already mentioned the origin of your trip to the travel agent? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for FROM valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Is the travel agent aware of your destination? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for TO valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Is the travel agent aware of your means of transportation? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for BY valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Have you informed the travel agent about your class preference? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for CLASS valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Do you believe that the travel agent is aware of when you are travelling? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for WHEN valid after 1 tries.
How do you want to reach your destination?
TRAVEL-AGENT: How do you want to reach your destination? Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.

ANSWER: By rented car please. I would like a comfortable vehicle with GPS and good fuel efficiency for the long drive. 

ASIDE: Do you have any specific preferences or requirements for the rental car? Any particular make or model in mind?
Abort: invalid format in slot filling.
